alert.note: Alert for Las Animas (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 05 at 4:57PM MDT until July 05 at 5:30PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Las Animas County in southeastern Colorado... * Until 530 PM MDT. * At 456 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hoehne, or near Trinidad, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of south central Las Animas County. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
